response.original_title: World War II Greatest Battles: The Normandy Invasion & The Victory
response.overview: The Normandy Invasion: See the planning and execution of the most famous battle in modern history, filmed as it occurred by U.S. Coast Guard cameramen,  from the massing of thousands of ships and men to the ultimate victory. Time: 21 minutes.  The Victory: This film focuses on the final year of the World War II on both fronts, including the liberation of Rome, Paris, and the Philippines, and the historic surrender of both the German and the Japanese armies. Time: 31 minutes.
response.tagline: From D-Day to surrender in Europe and the Pacific
response.title: World War II Greatest Battles: The Normandy Invasion & The Victory
